description: This Java source file defines the OAuthProperties class used for configuring OAuth provider settings, JWT parameters, and environment-specific options within a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: OAuthProperties
classes.description: Configuration holder for OAuth providers, JWT settings, redirect URL, and dev environment options.

classes.name: OAuthProperties.Jwt
classes.description: Nested class encapsulating JWT issuer, secret, and expiration details.

classes.name: OAuthProperties.Dev
classes.description: Nested class indicating development environment settings, such as login enablement.

classes.name: OAuthProperties.Provider
classes.description: Nested class containing OAuth provider-specific credentials and endpoint URIs.

methods.name: getJwt
methods.description: Returns the Jwt configuration object.

methods.name: setJwt
methods.description: Sets the Jwt configuration object.

methods.name: getRedirectBaseUrl
methods.description: Retrieves the base URL for OAuth redirect endpoints.

methods.name: setRedirectBaseUrl
methods.description: Sets the base URL for OAuth redirect endpoints.

methods.name: getDev
methods.description: Retrieves the Dev environment configuration.

methods.name: setDev
methods.description: Sets the Dev environment configuration.

methods.name: getProviders
methods.description: Returns the map of OAuth providers configurations.

methods.name: setProviders
methods.description: Sets the map of OAuth providers configurations.

methods.name: isLoginEnabled
methods.description: Indicates if login functionality is enabled in development settings.

methods.name: setLoginEnabled
methods.description: Enables or disables login in development settings.

methods.name: getIssuer
methods.description: Returns the JWT issuer string.

methods.name: setIssuer
methods.description: Sets the JWT issuer string.

methods.name: getSecret
methods.description: Returns the JWT secret key.

methods.name: setSecret
methods.description: Sets the JWT secret key.

methods.name: getExpirationSeconds
methods.description: Returns the JWT expiration time in seconds.

methods.name: setExpirationSeconds
methods.description: Sets the JWT expiration time in seconds.

methods.name: getClientId
methods.description: Retrieves the OAuth provider client ID.

methods.name: setClientId
methods.description: Sets the OAuth provider client ID.

methods.name: getClientSecret
methods.description: Retrieves the OAuth provider client secret.

methods.name: setClientSecret
methods.description: Sets the OAuth provider client secret.

methods.name: getAuthUri
methods.description: Retrieves the authorization URI for OAuth provider.

methods.name: setAuthUri
methods.description: Sets the authorization URI for OAuth provider.

methods.name: getTokenUri
methods.description: Retrieves the token URI for OAuth provider.

methods.name: setTokenUri
methods.description: Sets the token URI for OAuth provider.

methods.name: getUserInfoUri
methods.description: Retrieves the user info URI for OAuth provider.

methods.name: setUserInfoUri
methods.description: Sets the user info URI for OAuth provider.

methods.name: getEmailUri
methods.description: Retrieves the email URI for OAuth provider.

methods.name: setEmailUri
methods.description: Sets the email URI for OAuth provider.

methods.name: getScopes
methods.description: Retrieves the scope string for OAuth provider.

methods.name: setScopes
methods.description: Sets the scope string for OAuth provider.
